title: Fragment, ca. 1785
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave
markings: a partial chef at the bottom. " MANUFACTURE  DE DUBERN. ET CO" and the tops of a few characters on the second line indicating a plural or possessive for one word and a number which might be 17.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (all edges cut): 107.5 x 25.5 cm (42 5/16 x 10 1/16 in.)
Repeat H: 91.4 cm (36 in.)
description:
Figures in rural landscapes and a banner with three fleur de lys. 
In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, ca. 1785.
ca. 1785. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-89.
